channel.title: UK Exam Season
channel.description:
It's that time of year again. Best of luck with all your exams!
I did the Edexcel C1 paper today and I feel it went well! :)

item.title: UK Exam Season
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Ashi:

The UK is ahead of the US in terms of educations apparently.

Definitely. Compare us to Asia and we’re shit.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Exam Season
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Pure_:

Let the country war begin…

Haha, their education system is obviously good, I just think that their curriculum is about a year behind us, especially in terms of maths. In terms of English and vocabulary, they’re a year ahead of us or so. I intend to go to university in America so I’ve taken the SAT, the maths is definitely GCSE-level but some of the vocabulary was tricky.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Exam Season
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:51, topic:543198”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=662074.msg4429239#msg4429239 date=1402419997]

Can someone explain these “UK Exams”? Do you all take the same exams?

People who take the same subjects (e.g. computing A level or maths GCSE) may have the same exam depending on what exam board they where with. There are only like 3 exam boards (ocr, aqa and edexcel) so the chances that somebody took the same paper as pretty high I think.

[size=8pt]If you feel left out make a thread for US Exams or Canadian Exams etc :p[/size]
[/quote]

I don’t know of the US doing something so standardized except for the SAT, ACT, GRE, etc.[/quote]

Ours are the equivalent of SAT Subject Tests, I guess.

Read full topic

[/quote]
People who take the same subjects (e.g. computing A level or maths GCSE) may have the same exam depending on what exam board they where with. There are only like 3 exam boards (ocr, aqa and edexcel) so the chances that somebody took the same paper as pretty high I think.

item.title: UK Exam Season
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:49, topic:543198”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=662074.msg4429243#msg4429243 date=1402420981]

[quote author=Ambokile link=topic=662074.msg4429054#msg4429054 date=1402334388]

What did you guys put for the question with the I/O Controller? I had no idea. And did you both get “B” for the boolean algebra simplification?

yeh i got “B”, de morgans then cancel out
[/quote]Same.

Phew, what about the I/O controller one? They were really the only two I struggled on. I found the long question difficult as I don’t know how a barcode scanner actually reads it but I know about how it uses the check digit so I should have got a few marks

wait, was the I/O controller the CPU question? if so, i just put that it could overheat and send like wrong signals.
[/quote]Yeah that one. I put it would be a hassle to detach shit directly connected to the CPU and that it wouldn’t be able to utilize the control bus (thus cant be pinged for responsiveness).[/quote]
I put that it could fuck up the cpu

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_

wait, was the I/O controller the CPU question? if so, i just put that it could overheat and send like wrong signals.[/quote]Yeah that one. I put it would be a hassle to detach shit directly connected to the CPU and that it wouldn’t be able to utilize the control bus (thus cant be pinged for responsiveness).

item.title: UK Exam Season
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:35, topic:543198”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=662074.msg4428924#msg4428924 date=1402264322]
Fuck doing exams. For then to go into another 4 years of education. Nah. You’re alright.
[/quote]

rip my MEng[/quote]

MEng isn’t bad at least there’s plenty jobs for afterwards (at least definitely in mechanical if that’s the route you’re taking, deal with a lot of them on a daily basis) and people advance and complete their MA in like a year. It’s the idiots who do a bachelors in fucking party planning or some bollocks degree that takes 4 years and is only recognised by a small company in the middle of Tanzania and then complain about having a degree getting them nowhere. Well no fucking shit. They might as well sell degrees these days with some of the retard courses they have on offer.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Exam Season
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Yeah I’ve got G492 Physics OCR tomorrow, and then COMP2 in the afternoon. Not looking forward to either of them, really.

Anyone have the US SAT yesterday? How’d you find it? I found the maths pretty easy and the English was definitely easier than when I did it in January.

Read full topic
